ContributeDescription.spanish: Contribuye en cualquier forma en la que puedas.

ModsDescription.spanish: Modificaciones, Mapas y campa√±as personalizadas soportadas en Unity.

Changelog.spanish: List de cambios hechos a el repositorio. (Solo en ingles)

TutorialsDescription.spanish: Todo tipo de tutoriales explicandote como hacer un mod en Unity.

EntityGuideDescription.spanish: Guia en el uso de las entidades de Unity.

CreditsWrong.english: If any of these links fails or you consider your name should be there let us know.
CreditsWrong.spanish: Si alguno de estos enlaces falla o consideras que tu nombre deberia estar ahi dejanos saber.

valve_expansions_1.english: Install the Visual Studio 2022 re-distributable. You can find it in the `unity/redist` directory.

valve_expansions_2.english: Install the .NET 6 SDK which includes the runtime. Make sure to install the latest version as the runtime is updated regularly.

valve_expansions_3.english: Switch Half-Life to the `steam_legacy` branch. The Unified SDK has not been updated to the anniversary version and requires the old version. This is only required during installation; after installation you can switch back to the anniversary version.

valve_expansions_4.english: Run the tool in a command line window:

content_installer_1.english: The Content Installer tool is used to copy, convert and upgrade Half-Life game assets for a mod installation.

content_installer_2.english: This will copy campaign, training and multiplayer maps and apply any necessary upgrades and bug fixes.

content_installer_3.english: It will also install a default `config.cfg` with correct key bindings if there is none in the mod directory.

content_installer_5.english: If provided no file changes will be written to disk

content_installer_9.english: You can optionally provide `--dry-run` to see which files would be copied without actually making any changes.

Monster::health.english: Custom health (leave undefined to use default)

ammo_all::note_1.english: Combine with `trigger_changekeyvalue` to dynamically change ammo type

func_friction::classname.english: Surface with a change in friction

func_rotating::spawnorigin.english: X Y Z - Move here after lighting

game_text::fadein.english: Fade in Time (or character scan time)

item_battery::armor_amount.english: Amount Of Armor To Give (-1 == Maximum)

item_healthkit::health_amount.english: Amount Of Health To Give (-1 == Maximum)

logic_campaignselect::classname.english: Shows the campaign select menu on trigger (hlu_campaignselect map only)

logic_isskill::classname.english: Fires a target based on the current skill level

logic_setskill::classname.english:
Set skill level to specified value
Some variables require a map change to take effect

logic_setskillvar::classname.english: Set skill variables to a provided value

player_hassuit::classname.english: Fires a target based on whether the activating player has a suit or not

player_hasweapon::classname.english: Fires a target based on whether the activating player has the given weapon or not

player_sethudcolor::classname.english: Set or reset player hud color

player_setcrosshaircolor::classname.english: Set or reset player crosshair color

point_teleport::classname.english: Teleport target to this entity on trigger
